price: 5. Die hebben leiding van hun Heer, en die zijn de geslaagden.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ عَلَىٰ هُدٗى مِّن رَّبِّهِمۡۖ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: ulāika ʿalā hudan min rabbihim wa-ulāika humu al-muf'liḥūna
